author: Tom Polansek
title: Smithfield shutting U.S. pork plant indefinitely, warns of meat shortages during coronavirus pandemic - The Globe and Mail

content:
Employees and family members protest outside a Smithfield Foods processing plant in Sioux Falls, S.D. on April 9, 2020. The plant has had an outbreak of coronavirus cases according to Gov. Kristi Noem. 
Stephen Groves/The Associated Press
